name: AirShock
description: AirShock is from a combat helicopter pilot to the US Army General. Take part in the Middle East War on International Terrorism.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: QuadCore Intel Pentium 2.1 MHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT або AMD HD 4870 з 1 Гб пам'яті (DX 10, 10,1, 11) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: 100% compatible with DirectX 11 Additional Notes: The minimum screen resolution is 1366x768
